title: Diffusion-Based Generation of Neural Activity from Disentangled Latent Codes
details: JD McCart, AR Sedler, C Versteeg, D Mifsud… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Recent advances in recording technology have allowed neuroscientists to monitor activity from thousands of neurons simultaneously. Latent variable models are increasingly valuable for distilling these recordings into compact and interpretable …

title: CI-VAE for Single-Cell: Leveraging Generative-AI to Enhance Disease Understanding
details: M Nabian, Z Eftekhari, CW Wong - … Conference on Artificial Intelligence in Medicine, 2024
abstract: Understanding cellular disease processes like cancer is key for improving diagnosis and treatment. Single-cell RNA sequencing (scRNA-seq) enables modeling transitions between normal and diseased cellular states in complex tissues …
